content: {"Name": "Holy Trinity Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 3785, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Holy Trinity Parish Church", "More_Information": "Clients come every 30 days for food and must call 518-257-2501 before coming in.
